applyCode.title: Code laagu karein
applyCode.introduction: Bloom partners ke saath kaam karta hai tak duniya bhar ke survivors ki healing mein sahyog kar sake.
applyCode.description: Yadi aapko hamare kisi partner se access code mila hai toh aap usse add kar sakte hain taki aapko programme specific sahayata mil sake.
applyCode.descriptionLine2: Aap ek se adhik partner ke code jod sakte hain.
applyCode.partnershipsDescription: Hamari partnerships ke bare mein aur jaanne ke liye unke logo par click kariye.
applyCode.formIntroduction: Bloom partner se mila access code daaliye.

formSuccess.success: Appke account par ek Bumble code laga gaya hai!
formSuccess.successLine2: Aapka Bumble access neeche di gai cheezon saksham karta hai:

form.assignPartnerAccessError: Apke account pe code lagane mein error aya hai.  Baad mein dubara prayaas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko meesage kariye</contactLink> agar aapko yeh error dobara aa raha hai.

codeErrors.internal: Aapke access code ko validate karne mein error aa raha hai. Baad mein dubara prayaas kariye aur <contactLink>Bloom ki team ko meesage kariye</contactLink> agar aapko yeh error dobara aa raha hai.
codeErrors.expired: Yeh code expire ho chuka hai. Partner ki team se sampark karein.
codeErrors.invalid: Aapka access code invalid hai. Typos ki jaanch karein ya fir partner se sampark karein.
codeErrors.alreadyInUse: Yeh code pehle se he istemaal ho chuka hai. Agar aapko lagta hai ki koi galti hui hai, toh partner ki team se sampark karein.

aboutYou.title: Aapke bare mein
aboutYou.description: Yeh sawal humein samjhne mein madad karte hain ki kaun Bloom istemaal kar raha hai aur unhe humse kis tarha ki support chahiye.
aboutYou.descriptionALine1: Abtak aapke uttaron ke liye shukriya!
aboutYou.descriptionALine2: Kyuki aap hamare naye user hain, hum samjhna chahte hain ki hamari sevaon ko istemaal karne se pehle aapn kesa mehsoos kar rahe hain. Hum yeh poochte hain taki hum measure kar sakein ki Bloom ka istemaal karne se survivours par kya asar pad raha hai taki hum sahi cheezo par focus kar paye.

demographicForm.genderHelpText: Bloom bana hai kai tarah ki gender identities wale logon ke liye, hum jaante hain ki sabka gender based violence ka experience alag hota hai. Agar aap humein apna gender batate hain toh humein aur achi madad milegi yeh samjhne mein ki hum kiske liye design kar rahe hain.
demographicForm.neurodivergentLabel: Kya aap apne aapko neuro-divergent ke roop mein describe karenge?
demographicForm.neurodivergentHelpText: Hum apni sevaon ko ese deisgn karte hai ko vo sabke liye inclusive ho. Toh humare liye bahut helpful hota hai jab humein neurodivergent logon se feedback milti hai.
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnLabel: Aapki race, ethnicity and nationality kya hai? E.g., White Hispanic Mexican, or Tamil Indian.
demographicForm.raceEthnNatnHelpText: Hum jaante hain ki sab logon ka unki race aur ethnicity ke sath experience alag hota hai jo depend karta hai ki vo kahan rehte hain. Toh aap vo likhiye jo sabse achi tarha se aapko describe karta hai.
demographicForm.countryLabel: Aap kaunse desh mein abhi reh rahe hain?
demographicForm.countryHelpText: Yeh samjhne mein humein madad karega ki survivors services kahan se le rahe hain

baseForm.scaleDescriptionLine1: apni sehmati ke anusaar neeche likhe hue statements ko rate karein:
baseForm.scaleDescriptionLine2: 1 = Poori tarha asehmat, 10 = Poori tarha sehmat

scaleLabels.Q1: Mein samjhti hu ki jo trauma mene experience kiya hai usne kese mere dimaag, shareen aur feelings ko affect kiya hai
scaleLabels.Q2: Mujhe pata hai ki kuch coping mechanisms mujhe long term mein help nahi karte, par yeh bhi pata hai un comping mechanisms ki taraf akarshit hona ek normal trauma response hai
scaleLabels.Q3: Mujhe pata hai ki heal karne ke liye waqt, energy aur sabar chahiye hota hain
scaleLabels.Q4: Iâ€™m committed to giving myself the attention that I need to heal
scaleLabels.Q5: Mujhe pata hai ki mujhe kya cheezein karna pasand hai aur mein unhe karne ke liye apne routine mein se time nikaalti hu
scaleLabels.Q6: Mein samajhti hu ki trauma se heal hone ka ek hissa hai apne triggers ke saath deal karna
scaleLabels.Q7: Mein samajhti hu ki jo cheezein mujhe surakshit ya asurakshit mehsoos karati hai vo mereliye unique hai
scaleLabels.Q8: Mein pehle he samjh jati hoon jab mere triggering moments, jagahein ya waqt aasakte ho aur unke saath cope karparti hoon.

setAForm.hopesLabel: Esi kya ek cheez hai jo aap asha karte ho ki Bloom apko samjhne ya karne mein madad karega?

setBForm.bloomHelpLabel: Bloom ne meri madad kari hai:

bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ1: Janiye ki kai alag alag tarha ke abuse hote hain
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ2: Janiye ki toxic vyavhaar kya hote hain
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ3: Janiye ki kese humare culture mein kai alag alag tareeke ke oppression aur control hote hai jo abuse ki oor je jati hai.
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ4: Validated mehsoos karein - yeh jaan na ki jin cheezoon se mein guzri/gurzra hu vo theek nahi tha.
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ5: Yeh janna ki uss waqt mene jo bhi kiya ya nahi kiya,  mere saath jo bhi hua meri galti nahi thi.
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ6: Protsahit mehsoos karna - yeh jaanke ko mere jaise aur bhi log hain
bloomHelpedMeScaleLabels.bhmQ7: Khud ko ek survivor samjhte hain

setCForm.sinceBloomLabel: Bloom ka istemaal karne ke baad se:

sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ1: Mujhe lagta hai ki mein apne traumatic experience ke saath reh sakti/sakta hoon.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ2: Mein pyaar aur dekhbhaal ke layak aur worthy mehsoos karti/karta hoon.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ3: Mein apne liye kalpna karne, sapne dekhne aur achi cheezein karne mein adhik saksham mehsoos karti/karta hoon
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ4: Mujhe vishwas hai ki agar mujhe relationship chahiye toh mujhe ek healthy saathi mil sakta/sakti hai.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ5: Mujhe lagta hai ki mein achi choices banane ke liye khud par vishwas kar sakti hoon.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ6: Mujhe misogyny aur inequality ko gehrai mein jaanne mein dilchaspi hai.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ7: Mujhe unn courses mein dichaspi hain jo unn cheezo ke bare mein baat karte jinhe mene anubhav nahi kiya hai lekin mera samna ho sakta hai.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ8: Mein bhavishya ke red flags dekh sakti/sakta hoon aur vo hanikarak vyavhaar bhi jo mujhe nuksaan pahucha sakte hain.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ9: Mujhe doosre healing ke tareeke mile hain jo mein explore karna chahti hoon (jaise ki therapy, local charity resources)
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ10: Mujhe lagta hai ki mein doosron se madad maang sakti hoon aur unse mada le sakti hoon ( jaise dost, parivar, therapists, police or charities)
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ11: Mein khush-khushi Bloom ko ek ese dost ke sath share karsakti hoon jo meri tarah similar stithi mein hoon.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ12: Mujhe lagta hai ki mein doosre logon ko apni kahani ke saath trust kar sakti/sakta hoon, mere experience share karne se unki healing mein bhi madad ho sakti hai.
sinceBloomScaleLabels.sbQ13: Survivors ki community ka hissa banna mere liye aur doosron ke liye ek shaktishaali baat hai, bhale he hum chahte ki yeh abusive experience na ho jo humein jodta ho.
